question: What day of the week does the Korean cooking-variety program featuring the owner of "Dear. bread" air?
responder_answer: I’m not aware of any publicly documented Korean cooking-variety program featuring the owner of “Dear. bread,” so I cannot determine what day of the week it airs.
revisor_answer: The Korean cooking-variety program “Please Take Care of My Refrigerator,” featuring Lee Won-il (former owner of Dear. Bread), airs weekly on Fridays on JTBC.
